name: Burial Stone Demo
description:
This is the Demo of Burial Stone, a VR or non VR classic dungeon crawl.

Burial Stone is a single player RPG, with Rogue tactical mechanics of "you walk the world moves with you".

A variety of classes, weapons and spells/skills.

A variety of monsters, riddles and settings.

If you liked the Demo, please consider buying the full game from Steam.
